meanings.definition: A heterocyclic compound containing one oxygen and one nitrogen atom in a six-membered ring.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the oxazine under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The oxazine is commonly used in the production of dyes.
meanings.sent3: The oxazine and the nitrogen atom had a chat about their ring structure.
meanings.sent4: The oxygen and nitrogen in the oxazine danced together in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The six-membered ring of the oxazine glowed under the UV light.
